action.action-desc: Mr. Gimenez (for himself and Mr. Katko) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to clarify the use of detection at range technology for the screening of passengers, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Detection at Range Technology for Screening of Passengers Act.

section.header: Clarification of use of detection at range technology for screening of passengers
section.text: Paragraph (2) of section 44901(l) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (A), by striking and after the semicolon and inserting or; and

subparagraph.text: by inserting , including section 521 of title V of division F of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2018 (Public Law 115–141), after requirements; and
by inserting civil rights, civil liberties, and before privacy.
